comments.body: Added a brief description as when I revisited the test I needed to look at the code to remember what the test was for.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +57,61 @@ * This test asserts that when Kafka Streams is closing and shuts
 * down a StreamThread the closing of the GlobalStreamThread happens
 * after all the StreamThreads are completely stopped.
 *
 * The test validates the Processor still has access to the GlobalStateStore while closing.

comments.body: This should only ever get incremented once
